constituent: draft, wheat, cereal, tall, top hat, mouth, hood, mouth, mouth2
heisigStory: The key word connotes the preliminary composition of a plan or manuscript. Its elements: wheat . . . tall.
koohiiStory1: The first DRAFT of catcher in the rye was actually called "catcher in the TALL WHEAT"...good thing they changed it. I read it in 高校.
koohiiStory2: Aliens often draft their plans for invasion by cutting designs among the tall wheat.
myStory: cảo. rơm rạ, bản thảo, bản nháp. chữ hoà (lúa chưa cắt rơm dạ) và chữ cao.
